channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Plants2Gardens
channel.desc: Specialising in mature plants for instant impact, Plants2Gardens offer a huge array of vibrant, colourful blooms to help transform your outdoor space and bring your garden to life.

channel.title: Margaret Dabbs London

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: Cozee Home
channel.desc: Create a warm and cosy sanctuary in your home, with the Cozee Home range of snuggly bedding, throws and accessories offering comfort and coziness in your home.

channel.name: QVC UK
channel.title: New Season Italian Gold
channel.desc: Embark on an Italian Gold Jewellery Tour with exquisite Murona Gold from Venice and timeless classics from Arezzo and Vicenza in this delightful jewellery collection.

channel.desc: Join designer Kim Mendelson as she presents her latest lines. Daytime chic to evening sophistication, weekend comfort to party glamour, the Kim & Co collection is designed for every aspect of life.
